revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DAP-2590 rev A2 side.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AirPremier N Dual Band PoE Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.com/us/en/support/product/dap-2590-wireless-n-dual-band-poe-access-point |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DAP-2590_rev_A2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DAP-2590 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRKWMPND03 |icid = 4833A-WMPND03 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5010;CN5010, 400, BG564, SCP, G; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV128DBT2I-90Q; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS1G1631C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 14:D6:4D, 1C:AF:F7 |oui = 14:D6:4D, 1C:AF:F7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build v0.11; |stockos = Linux;2.6.16.26;Cavium-Octeon;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 5-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = IEEE 802.3af PD Controller w/integrated DC/DC;TI;TPS23750;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, 600mA CMOS LDO Regulator;AME;AME8807;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;TI;SN74HC08;;1;,,, 3A, 4MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Richtek;RT8004;;2;,,, 150V Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF7541;;1;,,, 60V Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF7478;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.50 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink |defaultssid_regex = ^dlink$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/20/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069316043 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001G5W62S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMP-ND03 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Additional specifications, per '''D-Link''''s datasheet, follow... *Antenna gain **4 dBi @ 2.4 GHz **6 dBi @ 5 GHz *Max. Output Power **15 dBm @ 2.4 GHz **17 dBm @ 5 GHz *Max. EIRP **23.7 dBm @ 2.4 GHz **26.7 dBm @ 5 GHz *Max. Power Consumption: 12.5W *Dimensions (WxHxD): [[Dimensions::165 mm x 43 mm x 186 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::762 g]] / [[Weight::1.7 lbs]]
Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''D-Link''''s manual.
